sentences.en: Before long, this element proliferation began to frustrate the chemists.
sentences.cn: 不久后, 元素的这个增生开始冲击化学家们.

sentences.en: But Mr McCain might frustrate him again.
sentences.cn: 但是麦凯恩先生可能会重新受挫.

sentences.en: Doesn't it frustrate you that audiences in the theatre are so restricted?
sentences.cn: 观众在剧场里要受到如此多的限制，这难道不令人恼火吗？

sentences.en: Forget the eclipse yesterday ; not frustrate oncoming tomorrow; cherish and take advantage of today.
sentences.cn: 昨天已经逝去,把它忘记.明天还未到来,不必烦恼. 今天就在这里, 把它用好.

sentences.en: Fun things just work; they do not frustrate.
sentences.cn: 有趣的东西会运作 顺畅,不会带来挫折感.

sentences.en: Giving the child problems he can't solve will only frustrate him.
sentences.cn: 把孩子所不能解决的问题给他只会使他丧气.

sentences.en: I know I frustrate you sometimes, but I'll change, can't we start over?
sentences.cn: 我知道我有时候很让你泄气, 但我会改的, 我们能重新开始 吗 ?

sentences.en: Part three: The implement of Ideological and Political frustrate teaching.
sentences.cn: 第三部分: 思想政治课挫折教育的实施.

sentences.en: Stevie Franchise could dominate and frustrate, from one possession to the next.
sentences.cn: 从一次控球到另一次控球,他能从统治一切,堕落到让所有的人都沮丧不已.

sentences.en: The fact that he’s working with amateurs really frustrates him.
sentences.cn: 与生手共事着实让他沮丧。

sentences.en: The prisoner made a frustrate attempt to escape.
Their attempts to speak to him were frustrated by the guards.
sentences.cn: 他们想跟他说话，但被警卫拦住了。

sentences.en: They made their preparations to frustrate the conspiracy.
sentences.cn: 他们作好准备挫败这个阴谋.

sentences.en: This is the place that we frustrate enemy.
sentences.cn: 这是我们挫败敌人的地方.

sentences.en: Tongue twisters always frustrate me because I cannot say them correctly.
sentences.cn: 绕口令一向让我很头大,因为我总是说错.

sentences.en: We will frustrate you, my friends, deep as you think yourselves.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友呀, 尽管你们自以为高深莫测, 我们会挫败你们的.

sentences.en: When oneself meets frustrate, the smile faces a difficulty, can make oneself re - set up living confidence.
sentences.cn: 当自己遇到挫折时, 微笑面对困难, 能使自己重新树立生活的信心.

words.tran_cn: 挫败；阻挠（frustrate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to prevent someone’s plans, efforts, or attempts from succeeding
if something frustrates you, it makes you feel annoyed or angry because you are unable to do what you want
